Overcoming Autism: Finding the Answers, Strategies, and Hope That Can Transform a Child's Life bụ akwụkwọ nke onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Claire Scovell LaZebrik dere ya na onye na-agwọ ọrịa Lynn Level, nke UCSB AutismImeri Autism: Ịchọta azịza, Strategies, na Olileanya nke nwere ike ịgbanwe ndụ nwata bụ akwụkwọ nke onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Claire Scovell LaZebrik dere ya na onye na-agwọ ọrịa Lynn Level, nke UCSB Autism Ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na ọzụzụ, na 2004.[Tinye edensibịa]
Akwụkwọ a abụghị akụkọ ifo ma na-anọchite anya echiche nyocha omume
Ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na'akwado iji ọgwụgwọ nzaghachi dị mkpa na ịrụ ọrụ na ụmụaka dị autistic.[Tinye edensibịa]
Isi nke Mbụ - Nnyocha: Ịlanarị Akụkọ Kasị njọ Ị ga-enweta/Diagnosis: Surviving the Worst News You'll Ever Get
Isi nke Abụọ - Ịkwụsị Ogologo Ogwe Nkwurịta Okwu: Ịkụziri Nwa Gị Ka Ịma Ntụziaka/Ending the Long Silence: Teaching Your Child to Communicate
Isi nke Atọ - Anya mmiri, Mgbaze, Mwakpo, na Mmerụ Onwe Onye: Ịgbaji Okirikiri/Tears, Meltdowns, Aggression, and Self-Injury: Breaking the Cycle
Isi nke anọ - Mmetụta Onwe Onye: Ịkụ aka, Ịgba, Na-agbagọ agbagha, na Omume Ndị Ọzọ/Self-Stimulation: Flapping, Banging, Twirling, and Other Repetitive Behaviors
Isi nke Ise - Nkà Mmekọrịta: Ịtụgharị Asụsụ na Egwuregwu n'ime Mmetụta Dị Mkpa/Social Skills: Turning Language and Play into Meaningful Interactions
Isi nke Isii - Ịlụso Egwu na Mgbanwe: Iweghachi Nwa Gị n'Ụwa N'ezie/Battling Fears and Fixations: Bringing Your Child Back to the Real World
Isi nke asaa - Mmụta: Ịchọta Ebe Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Dị Mma ma Mee ka Ọ bụrụ Ihe Dị Ama/Education: Finding the Right School Placement and Making It Even More Right
Isi nke Asatọ - Ndụ Ezinụlọ: Ịlụ ọgụ n'ụzọ ị ga-esi laghachi n"ọnọdụ gị/Family Life: Fighting Your Way Back to Normalcy
